title: Fix grammar: pluralize user accounts
author: ritik35k
details: Fixed grammatical error by pluralizing "user account" to "user accounts" in documentation.
Updated line in `types-of-github-accounts.md` to correctly reflect multiple account types.
No functional changes; purely a language correction.
